name: thick-club
effect: Held by Cubone or Marowak: Doubles the holder’s Attack.

flavor_text.black_white: An item to be held by Cubone or Marowak. It is a hard bone of some sort that boosts the Attack stat.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: An item to be held by Cubone or Marowak. It is a hard bone of some sort that boosts the Attack stat.
